Description

This class handles the authentication process for users to access endpoints

Interface for exercises.

Controller for handling exercise API requests.

Represents an exercise dto

This class generates exercises based on the given grade and exercise subtype.

Enum for exercise sub types.
Grade
Enum for the different grades 1-6

This class is used to map json strings to objects and vice versa.

Represents a maths exercise
MathsGenerator
Generates exercises for the math basics category (sorting, neighbors, ...)

Enum for the different modes of the game.

Role
Enum containing all the possible roles a user may have

Class responsible for creating endpoints to communicate between Front- and Backend
Scoreboard
This class represents an AVL-tree that stores the user's data in the scoreboard.

This class represents a node in the Scoreboard

Class representing the settings of the application

Class representing the http settings

Class representing the https settings
SettingsNotFoundException
Exception that is thrown when the settings.json file is not found
User
User model with username, level and experience Every 100exp, the level will increase by one
UserApiController
Class responsible for handling user CRUD operations
UserRepository
This class is responsible for managing the users in the system.
